snippet: The tour bus was returning to Mexico from a ski resort when the driver lost control of the vehicle on Sunday night near Yucaipa, 80 miles east of Los Angeles.
abstract: California Highway Patrol investigators are still trying to determine cause of tour bus crash near Yucaipa, 80 miles east of Los Angeles, that killed at least seven people and injured dozens more.
lead_paragraph: The tour bus was returning to Mexico from a ski resort when the driver lost control of the vehicle on Sunday night near Yucaipa, 80 miles east of Los Angeles.

headline.seo: Fatal California Bus Crash Is Investigated
headline.main: Cause Sought in Bus Crash That Killed 7 in California
headline.print_headline: Cause Sought In Bus Crash That Killed 7 In California
